PSCT.Base: Target 1 monster your opponent controls that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck and 1 Fusion Monster you control; shuffle them into the Deck(s), also, during the End Phase of this turn, each player can Special Summon 1 Fusion Monster that mentions "Fallen of Albaz" as material from their own Extra Deck. You can only activate 1 "Branded Loss" per turn.
